name: ░▒▌Firefox Status Text - Anywhere▐▒░
description: For Fx25+: Keep the addon-bar visible. For versions prior: Add the "Activity Indicator" to the left of a "Flexible Space", place these two items anywhere, on any toolbar. The Flexible Space will be coloured green if you've customised correctly. Your status text will appear there (Firefox 4+ only). Uses only CSS; no bloat.
